name: State Your Piece
description:
From the 100 Days of Drawing Series //

This 2021 personal challenge started in early March. The goal, to produce a finished piece, everyday, for 100 days  // This is day 3 of that challenge // 

"Naked and defiant. Smoke and mirrors don't scare here. She is home to the Fantom." 

3000x3000 PNG
